title: 이달의소녀탐구 #474 (LOONA TV #474)
summary:
It is night time in Paris.
0:05 -- Go Won: "I can see the Eiffel Tower" (fun fact: taking images/videos of the Eiffel Tower at night is illegal. gg BBC totally savage)
0:16 -- Hyejoo: "Seeing the Eiffel Tower irl is like looking at a toy."
0:24 -- Cuts to HeeJin era where she is excited about the Eiffel Tower.
0:27 -- Go Won is waiting for it to twinkle at midnight. She looks around for someone to take a picture of her but she couldn't so she just poses in front of the LTV camera. Olivia Hye does the same.
